meanings.definition: A paste used for cleaning teeth.
meanings.sent1: I squeezed some toothpaste onto my toothbrush.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new tube of toothpaste from the store.
meanings.sent3: The toothpaste made my teeth sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as toothpaste on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The minty scent of toothpaste filled the bathroom.

meanings.sent1: Every morning, I brush my teeth with toothpaste.
meanings.sent2: He carefully applied toothpaste on his toothbrush before brushing.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used too much toothpaste and created a foamy mess.
meanings.sent4: Brushing with toothpaste felt like giving my teeth a spa treatment.
meanings.sent5: The toothpaste worked its magic, leaving my mouth fresh and clean.
